Quality Education.reason: Course aims to provide a basic understanding of financial markets → relevant to Quality Education.
evidence: basic understanding of financial markets

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: Course discusses financial markets and economic analysis → relevant to Economic Growth.
evidence: financial markets
economic analysis

No Poverty.reason: The course covers macroeconomic and monetary policy, which are fundamental tools for creating economic stability, a prerequisite for poverty reduction. The link is indirect.
evidence: 總體經濟與貨幣政策 (Macroeconomics and monetary policy)
apply textbook knowledge to real-world problems

Quality Education.reason: As a university course, it directly contributes to quality education by providing students with a "basic understanding of financial markets" and analytical skills.
evidence: have a basic understanding of financial markets
illustrate economic figures, graphs and equations
apply textbook knowledge to real-world problems

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: The course is fundamentally about the mechanisms of economic growth, covering "money, the banking business and financial markets," "monetary policy," and "macroeconomics."
evidence: issues related to money, the banking business and financial markets
總體經濟與貨幣政策 (Macroeconomics and monetary policy)
中央銀行與總體經濟流動性 (Central bank and macroeconomic liquidity)

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: The course focuses on "financial markets" and the "banking business," which constitute the financial infrastructure essential for funding industry and innovation.
evidence: 金融體系概論 (Introduction to the financial system)
the banking business
債券市場與利率的決定 (The bond market and the determination of interest rates)

Reduced Inequalities.reason: The study of "monetary policy" and the "financial system" is relevant to understanding and addressing economic inequality, though not explicitly mentioned.
evidence: 貨幣政策的執行策略 (Execution strategies of monetary policy)
金融體系的經濟分析 (Economic analysis of the financial system)

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: The course analyzes the "Central bank's role and function" and the "financial system," which are key economic institutions for national stability and governance.
evidence: 中央銀行的角色與功能 (Central bank's role and function)
金融體系的經濟分析 (Economic analysis of the financial system)
貨幣政策工具 (Monetary policy tools)

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course covers "International financial issues," which relates to the global financial architecture and cooperation between nations necessary for achieving sustainable development.
evidence: 國際金融議題 (International financial issues)
